text: Vladimir Ambros (born 30 December 1993 in Chișinău) is a Moldovan footballer who plays as a forward for Petrocub Hîncești and the Moldova national team. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Moldova's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
